name: wiki-scraper-backend
description: Scalable TypeScript backend for Wikipedia scraper with AWS Lambda support

scripts.package: mkdir -p dist && cp -r src/ dist/ && cp package*.json dist/
scripts.package:lambda: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build && pnpm run package && cd dist && pnpm install --prod --no-optional && find . -type f \( -name '*.ts' -o -name '*.map' -o -name '*.md' -o -name '*.tsbuildinfo' \) -delete && find node_modules -type d \( -name 'test' -o -name 'tests' -o -name 'docs' -o -name 'examples' \) | xargs rm -rf && cd .. && (cd dist && zip -r ../function.zip . -x '*.ts' '*.ts.map' '*.md' '*.git*' '*.DS_Store' 'node_modules/aws-sdk/*' 'node_modules/chrome-aws-lambda/vendor/**/*')
scripts.deploy: pnpm run package:lambda && sam deploy --template-file template.yaml --no-fail-on-empty-changeset --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
scripts.local:api: DOCKER_HOST=unix://$HOME/.docker/run/docker.sock sam local start-api -t template.local.yaml --skip-pull-image --warm-containers LAZY --port 3000 --docker-network host
scripts.local:invoke: DOCKER_HOST=unix://$HOME/.docker/run/docker.sock sam local invoke -t template.local.yaml -e events/event.json --docker-network host
